account.tip: If that data is invalid - contact with our support to change it.

initChangePasswordForm.passwordTip: Password must be at least 8 characters length, contain at least one number, one capital letter, one small letter. Special characters are allowed.

changeTheme.tip: An easy theme may contain some errors. Preferably use a dark theme.

enable2faPopup.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
enable2faPopup.description: Scan the QR code with Google Authenticator app on your smartphone and enter the 6-digit PIN the app generated in order to enable 2FA.

disable2faPopup.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable2faPopup.description: Use Google Authenticator to get confirmation code.
